markdownRemark.html:
Hi Friends üëã,

Welcome To aGuideHub!

To make bold part of text of mui typography in React js, you can use this code fontWeight="bold. It will make bold part of text of mui typography in react js.

Today, I am going to show you, how to make bold part of text of mui typography in react js.

Installation

Install the following packages to use mui typography in react js.

npm

npm install @mui/material @emotion/react @emotion/styled

yarn

yarn add @mui/material @emotion/react @emotion/styled

Table of contents

  • Install MUI and create a new React app.
  • Import Material-UI Typography.
  • Make bold part of text of mui typography Component.

Step 1: Install MUI and create a new React app.

First you have to install the React project. You should use create-react-app command to create a new React project.

npx create-react-app my-app
cd my-app
npm start

Step 2: Import Material-UI Typography.

After installing MUI, you have to import your React component. To do this, add the following line to the top of your component file.

import { Typography, Box } from '@mui/material';

Step 3: Make bold part of text of mui typography Component.

You can use the Typography component in your react js. For example, The typography component is used to create text, box component to use fontWeight to set bold. 

<Typography>
  This is some <Box component="span" fontWeight="bold">bold text</Box> within a sentence.
</Typography>

MUI material make bold part of text of mui typography example.

The below code is an example, to make bold part in Typography, you need to import Typography Component. You can use box component, with the prop"fontWeight" set to "bold".

App.js

import { Typography, Box } from '@mui/material';

export default function App() {
  return (
    <Typography>
      This is some <Box component="span" fontWeight="bold">bold text</Box> within a sentence.
    </Typography>
  );
}

In the above code example, I have used the @mui/material component and made bold part of text of mui typography in react js.

Check the output of the above code example.

Here, we are provided code sandbox links for the above program make bold part of text of mui typography in react js. Then you can use whenever you want and do the changes as per your requirements.

Try it Yourself

All the best üëç
